first_translate: the northernmost region  haelion territory
this is house haelion’s castle...!
it feels so intimidating...

hangle: 나는 결국 가족에게 떠밀려 무자비한 공작이 다스린다는 북부 최전방에 왔다.
first_translate: I’ve been forced by my family to come all this way up north where I’ll have to live under the rule of duke haelion, known for his ruthlessness.

hangle: 딱 봐도 마왕성 같은 게 사람 엄청 굴릴 것 같다.
first_translate: that place looks like a demon king's lair! they must treat people terribly there.
have I dug myself into my own grave?
this way.
open the gates.
th-the gate is huge...!!!
duke of the north abel haelion
I’m sure you’re prepared,

hangle: 너 같은 어린애는 여기에 필요 없다.
first_translate: but we don’t need someone as young as you here.
go back home.

hangle: 쓸모없는 자에게 투자할 시간은 없다 이건가.
first_translate: does that mean he doesn’t want to waste time on me because I'm useless?

hangle: 아벨은 모르겠지만, 지금의 나는 마땅히 돌아갈 곳도 없어.
first_translate: little does abel know, but right now, I don’t even have anywhere else to go.

hangle: 원작 속의, 자신의 마법적 재능을 모르던 피오나는-
first_translate: in the original story, since fiona didn’t realize she had magical powers yet,
she was chased out from both her family and house haelion.
and at that moment, when she felt abandoned by everyone around her,

hangle: 후에 피오나가 악역이 되는 결정적인 계기가 된다.
first_translate: fiona made up her mind to become a villainess.

but unlike then, I already know about my abilities. I can use them to prove myself. besides, if I get kicked out again, I won’t have any other choice than to die alone in these woods. I better not mess things up today--
